thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Intervest Offices & Warehouses FY Net Result Rises To 21.2 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Intervest Offices & Warehouses FY Net Result Rises To 21.2 Million Euros
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - INTERVEST OFFICES & WAREHOUSES NV:
* AS AT 31 DEC 2017, FAIR VALUE OF TOTAL REAL ESTATE PORTFOLIO AMOUNTED TO EUR 663 MILLION
* AS AT DEC 2017, DEBT RATIO WAS 44.6 PERCENT * FY RENTAL INCOME EUR 43.3 MILLION VERSUS EUR 45.3 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY OPERATING RESULT EUR 27.7 MILLION VERSUS EUR 28.2 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY NET RESULT EUR 21.2 MILLION VERSUS EUR 20.6 MILLION YEAR AGO
* CONFIRMS DIVIDEND OF EUR 1.40 PER SHARE FOR FY 2017 * OCCUPANCY RATE OF REAL ESTATE PORTFOLIO WAS 86 PERCENT AS AT 31 DECEMBER 2017
* AIMS REAL ESTATE PORTFOLIO TO GROW TO EUR 800 MILLION BY THE END OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
